update ncp_vaccination_record set person_id = #{personId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, vaccination_type = #{vaccinationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, required_times = #{requiredTimes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, completion_times = #{completionTimes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE} where record_id = #{recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
